name: Straw Hat Samurai
storyline: In medieval Japan, clan wars threaten to devastate the country. The united army of Aka and Ryu are about to invade the southern lands. If they manage to fortify the mountain passage, there is no chance to take victory. The wise general selects a samurai to set off on a dangerous quest to rush forward and defeat the enemy commander thus giving time for the friendly forces to march to the mountain passage.
summary: A mouse controlled flash game where you draw slashes to attack enemies in different arenas style levels as you travel across the land to end a war.
